ai-kv12.2:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.2:1.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.2:1.11_0: Conduct is the intention to be reborn, (whether) intention is end.
ai-kv12.2:1.12_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.2:2.3_0: (There is) a result for sensual pleasures, with intention as an absence,
ai-kv12.2:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.2:2.7_0: Experiencing forms, variety of forms, results in the formless realm.
ai-kv12.2:2.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.2:3.3_0: (There is) in the sense-world, actions that are accompanied by defilements and results,
ai-kv12.2:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.2:3.7_0: In the fine-material sphere, action, livelihood, and effort.
ai-kv12.2:3.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv12.2:4.1_0: Through intentional activities there is no intention,
ai-kv12.2:4.3_0: There is a result for the consequence, not being discussed.
ai-kv12.2:5.1_0: Conduct is the intention to be reborn.
ai-kv12.2:5.3_0: Though there is no way of speaking, still ignorant and incompetent,
ai-kv12.2:6.1_0: * the wisdom there is from the sense-spheres in the formless-world sphere, the result of in the formless-world sphere.
ai-kv12.2:6.3_0: And if, without residing, his result is being destroyed, he should not be told:
ai-kv12.2:7.1_0: * the wisdom there is from the sense-spheres in the formless-world sphere, the intention that is not ignorant.
ai-kv12.2:7.3_0: Though there is no way including good conduct,
ai-kv12.2:8.5_0: “Mendicants, I don’t say that intentional deeds that have been performed and accumulated are eliminated without being experienced in the present life.”
ai-kv12.2:8.8_0: Therefore it is all the deeds that are own,
ai-kv12.2:8.9_0: The account of the legal procedures is finished.
